AboutUsPage.Section1Text: Наша материнская компания Dem Fırat Karven Tekstil была основана в 1991 году в Стамбуле компанией Cuma Ozturk. Джума был старшим ребенком в семье, где был 21 ребенок. Он вырос недалеко от иранской границы в сельской местности Турции. Из-за нехватки средств в детстве он бросил школу в возрасте девяти лет и начал работать в местных магазинах.
AboutUsPage.Section2Text1: Халатность родителей Джумы и то, что он был старшим среди своих братьев и сестер, возложили на него огромную ответственность — усердно работать и обеспечивать свою семью. Поэтому, чтобы быстро заработать деньги, он еще ребенком начал пересекать иранскую границу, чтобы покупать товары по более низкой цене, а затем привозил и торговал ими в Турции.
AboutUsPage.Section2Text2: Тем не менее, после того, как его неоднократно ловили и наказывали власти, он понял, что ему нужно найти долгосрочную и менее рискованную альтернативу. Поэтому в 13 лет он переехал на запад Турции в поисках лучших возможностей трудоустройства. После десятилетия тяжелой и кропотливой работы на стройках, в ресторанах и розничных магазинах на западе страны, в 1991 году, в возрасте 23 лет, он вместе с деловым партнером открыл свой первый текстильный магазин в Лалели, Стамбул. Однако в 1997 году, когда у него родился первый ребенок (это я!), у партнеров возникли разногласия, которые разошлись.
AboutUsPage.Section3Text: Хотя его бывшие партнеры пытались отговорить его и заставить уйти из бизнеса, это только побудило его открыть собственный магазин текстиля. Его искреннее отношение и высокое качество продукции сделали его магазин узнаваемым. С ростом спроса он начал привозить своих братьев и сестер на восток страны и нанимать их одного за другим.
AboutUsPage.Section4Text: Джума и его братья и сестры открыли свой первый зарубежный склад в Москве и начали поставлять турецкий текстиль на российский рынок, а затем расширились на Украину, Белоруссию и Казахстан.
AboutUsPage.Section5Text: Вскоре производственные партнеры Кумы не смогли удовлетворить растущий рыночный спрос. Итак, он приобрел пустующую землю площадью 60 000 SF и построил свою первую текстильную фабрику всего в часе езды от Стамбула, чтобы полностью контролировать производство и сократить ненужные расходы, которые несут его клиенты.
AboutUsPage.Section6Text1: Создание успешной компании и возможность заботиться о своих братьях и сестрах, нанимая их, воплотили мечты Кумы в реальность.
AboutUsPage.Section6Text2: Dem Fırat Karven начинала свою деятельность как небольшой семейный текстильный магазин в Стамбуле в 1991 году. Сегодня мы превратились в производственное предприятие, которое производит более 20 миллионов ярдов ткани каждый месяц и осуществляет поставки по всему миру благодаря своей развитой сети поставок.
AboutUsPage.Section6Text3: Рост был захватывающим и постоянно меняющимся путешествием. Однако наши основные ценности всегда оставались неизменными. Наша растущая семья — это то, что побуждает нас продолжать предоставлять высококачественную продукцию и исключительное обслуживание клиентов.

KVKK.title: General Data Protection Policy

section1.title: 1. Introduction
section1.text: At Karven Homedecor, we value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This General Data Protection Policy outlines how we collect, use, store, and safeguard your information when you visit our website or make a purchase, ensuring transparency and trust for our international customers.

section2.title: 2. Data We Collect
section2.text: We collect the following types of personal information to provide you with our services:
items: Identity Information: Name, surname
Contact Information: Email address, phone number, shipping and billing address
Transaction Information: Order history, product preferences, cart contents
Technical Information: IP address, device information, cookies
Payment Information: Encrypted payment details (processed securely by third-party providers)

section3.title: 3. How We Use Your Data
section3.text: Your personal data is used for the following purposes:
items: Processing and delivering your orders
Managing payments and invoicing
Providing customer support and resolving inquiries
Improving our website and user experience
Sending order updates and notifications
Marketing communications (only with your explicit consent)
Fraud prevention and security

section4.title: 4. Data Sharing
section4.text: We may share your data with trusted third parties solely for operational purposes:
items: Shipping Companies: To deliver your orders
Payment Processors: To securely process transactions (e.g., iyzico)
Service Providers: For website hosting and maintenance
Legal Authorities: If required by law
section4.note: We do not sell your personal data to third parties.

section5.title: 5. Data Security
section5.text: We implement robust security measures to protect your data:
items: SSL encryption for secure data transmission
PCI-DSS compliant payment processing
Secure servers and firewalls
Regular security audits

section6.title: 6. Your Rights
section6.text: We respect your rights regarding your personal data. You have the right to:
items: Access the personal data we hold about you
Request correction of inaccurate data
Request deletion of your data (subject to legal retention requirements)
Withdraw consent for marketing communications
Object to data processing in certain circumstances

section7.title: 7. Cookies
section7.text: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience. These include essential cookies for site functionality and optional analytics cookies to understand how you use our site. You can manage your cookie preferences through your browser settings.

section8.title: 8. Retention Period
section8.text: We retain your personal data only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which it was collected, including for the purposes of satisfying any legal, accounting, or reporting requirements.

section9.title: 9. International Transfers
section9.text: As we operate globally, your data may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your own. We ensure that appropriate safeguards are in place to protect your data during such transfers.

section10.title: 10. Contact Us
section10.text: If you have any questions about this policy or your personal data, please contact us:

KVKK.disclaimer: Note: This policy may be updated periodically to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. Please review it regularly.

ReturnPolicy.title: Return and Withdrawal Policy

section1.title: 1. General Information
section1.text: This page explains the withdrawal rights and return conditions for consumers shopping on the Karven Homedecor e-commerce site. Our return policy is designed to ensure customer satisfaction while complying with relevant consumer protection regulations.

section2.title: 2. Withdrawal Period
section2.text: You have the right to withdraw from the contract within 14 days of receiving your product, without giving any reason and without paying any penalty.
items: The withdrawal period starts from the day you or a third party indicated by you receives the product.
If the last day falls on a public holiday, the period extends to the end of the next business day.
As a seller, we may extend this period at our own initiative.
For multiple product orders, a separate withdrawal period starts for each product.

section3.title: 3. How to Exercise Your Right of Withdrawal
section3.text: To exercise your right of withdrawal, you can choose one of the following methods:
methods: Email: Send your withdrawal notification to info@demfirat.com
Online Form: Apply online via the "Return Procedures" page on our website
Written Notice: Fill out the withdrawal form and send it to our address
section3.note: Important: It is sufficient to notify us that you wish to withdraw. You do not need to state a reason.

section4.title: 4. Returning the Product
section4.text: After sending us your withdrawal notification:
steps: You must send the product back to us within 10 days.
The product must be unused, undamaged, and in its original packaging.
All accessories and documents that came with the product must be included.
The invoice or delivery note must be sent with the product.
packagingItems: Place the product in its original box.
Use additional protective material to prevent damage.
Send via insured shipping if possible.

section5.title: 5. Shipping Fees
infoItems: If the product is defective or incorrect: We cover the shipping cost.
If exercising the right of withdrawal only: The customer is responsible for return shipping costs.
For promotional products: Unless we covered the initial shipping, the customer pays for return shipping.
addressLines: Vakıflar OSB Mah. D100 Cad. No:38

section6.title: 6. Refunds
section6.text: We will refund the full amount you paid within 14 days of receiving your withdrawal notification.
processSteps: Withdrawal Notification: You inform us of your request.
Product Return: You ship the product within 10 days.
Product Inspection: The product is inspected in our warehouse (1-2 business days).
Refund: Your refund is processed according to your payment method.
methodItems: Credit Card: The refund appears on your card within 2-10 business days (depending on the bank).
Bank Transfer (EFT): Within 1-3 business days if you provide your account details.
Cash on Delivery: Refunded via EFT to your bank account.
section6.note: Important: Refunds will not be issued before we receive the product. However, the process starts once your application is accepted, even before the product arrives.

section7.title: 7. Exceptions to the Right of Withdrawal
section7.text: The right of withdrawal cannot be exercised in the following cases:
items: Goods prepared according to the customer's wishes or clearly personal needs (Custom Curtains).
Perishable goods or goods with a short shelf life.
Goods with protective elements like packaging, tape, or seals opened after delivery, which are unsuitable for return due to health and hygiene reasons.
Goods that are mixed with other products after delivery and cannot be separated by their nature.
Opened audio or video recordings, software programs, and computer consumables.
Services started with the consumer's approval before the withdrawal period ends.
Services performed instantly in an electronic environment or intangible goods delivered instantly to the consumer.
Goods whose price is determined in financial markets.
Books, digital content, and computer consumables.
section7.warning: Hygiene Products: Textile products with opened packaging or protective bands are excluded from the right of withdrawal due to hygiene rules.

section8.title: 8. Defective Products - Warranty Rights
section8.text: If you detect a defect (fault, error) in your product, you can use your rights regarding defective goods instead of the right of withdrawal:
items: Request free repair of the product.
Request replacement with a non-defective equivalent.
Request a price reduction in proportion to the defect.
Withdraw from the contract and request a refund.
section8.info: In case of a defective product, you can choose one of the above and notify us. As the seller, we are obliged to fulfill your chosen request.

section9.title: 9. Exchanges
section9.text: If you only want to exchange a product (different size, color, etc.), please first return the current product using your right of withdrawal, then create a new order.
section9.note: Direct exchanges may be possible depending on stock status. Please contact our customer service to evaluate your situation.

section10.title: 10. Contact
section10.text: For returns, withdrawal rights, or any questions:
